Html: Where is the -out parameter set in the project file. Or is there another way to have it build to a single file instead of manually building it?

I was messing with this yesterday, you want to set 'TypeScriptOutFile' in your .csproj. I have posted the full list of options at http://hutkev.blogspot.co.uk/2013/02/visualstudio-2012-typescript-project.html if you need others.

Regards
Kev

Thanks,

Nice to be able to see all the options.
